params.asset: asset address for which config should be set
params.config: config struct for asset in Silo
params.silo: Silo address for which config should be set

acceptOwnership().details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a pending owner Can only be called by the pending owner.

calculateCompoundInterestRate((int256,in.details: pure function that calculates interest rate based on raw input data

params._interestRateTimestamp: timestamp of last interest rate update

returns.Tcrit: time during which the utilization exceeds the critical value
returns.rcomp: compounded interest rate from last update until now (1e18 == 100%)
returns.ri: current integral part of the rate

calculateCompoundInterestRateWithOverflo.details: pure function that calculates interest rate based on raw input data

params._interestRateTimestamp: timestamp of last interest rate update

returns.Tcrit: time during which the utilization exceeds the critical value
returns.overflow: boolean flag to detect rcomp restriction
returns.rcomp: compounded interest rate from last update until now (1e18 == 100%)
returns.ri: current integral part of the rate

calculateCurrentInterestRate((int256,int.details: pure function that calculates current annual interest rate

params._interestRateTimestamp: timestamp of last interest rate update

params._asset: address of an asset in Silo for which interest rate should be calculated

returns.rcomp: compounded interest rate from last update until now (1e18 == 100%)

getCompoundInterestRateAndUpdate(address.details: get compound interest rate and update model storage

params._asset: address of an asset in Silo for which interest rate should be calculated

returns.rcomp: compounded interest rate from last update until now (1e18 == 100%)

getConfig(address,address).details: Get config for given asset in a Silo. If dedicated config is not set, default one will be returned.

params._asset: asset address for which config should be set
params._silo: Silo address for which config should be set

returns._0: Config struct for asset in Silo

params._asset: address of an asset in Silo for which interest rate should be calculated

interestRateModelPing().details: just a helper method to see if address is a InterestRateModel

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

removePendingOwnership().details: Clears the pending ownership. Can only be called by the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setConfig(address,address,(int256,int256.details: Set dedicated config for given asset in a Silo. Config is per asset per Silo so different assets in different Silo can have different configs. It will try to call `_silo.accrueInterest(_asset)` before updating config, but it is not guaranteed, that this call will be successful, if it fail config will be set anyway.

params._asset: asset address for which config should be set
params._silo: Silo address for which config should be set

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferPendingOwnership(address).details: Transfers pending ownership of the contract to a new account (`newPendingOwner`) and clears any existing pending ownership. Can only be called by the current owner.

ASSET_DATA_OVERFLOW_LIMIT.details: maximum allowed amount for accruedInterest, totalDeposits and totalBorrowedAmount after adding compounded interest. If rcomp cause this values to overflow, rcomp is reduced. 196 bits max allowed for an asset amounts because the multiplication product with decimal points (10^18) should not cause an overflow. 196 < log2(2^256 / 10^18)

DP.details: DP is 18 decimal points used for integer calculations

RCOMP_MAX.details: maximum value of compound interest the model will return

X_MAX.details: maximum value of X for which, RCOMP_MAX should be returned. If x > X_MAX => exp(x) > RCOMP_MAX. X_MAX = ln(RCOMP_MAX + 1)

OwnershipPending(address).notice: Emitted when ownership transfer is proposed, aka pending owner is set

OwnershipTransferred(address).notice: Emitted when ownership is transferred on `transferOwnership` and `acceptOwnership`

overflowDetected(address,address,uint256.notice: get the flag to detect rcomp restriction (zero current interest) due to overflow overflow boolean flag to detect rcomp restriction
